content: बहुधा {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} In many ways, variously, diversely, multifariously; बहुधाप्यागमैर्भिन्नाः <ls>R. 10. 26</ls>; <ls>Bg. 13. 4.</ls> {@--2@} In different forms or ways. {@--3@} Frequently, repeatedly. {@--4@} In various places or directions. ( बहुधाकृ {1} to multiply. {2} to make public, divulge.).
